text: I was an absolute mess wanting to take
my life like continually
I got I read the leaflet and I was
getting exactly what it said you know I
was getting kind of seizure like
symptoms where my muscles were kind of
jolting around of their own accord and I
felt disorientated and sick and had
digestive problems and infections and
and its really really extreme
one in four people become more anxious
rather than less and they can become
extraordinarily anxious so that some
people become very agitated and some go
on from that to become suicidal
I think with people with severe
depression you may well need to try two
or possibly three before you find one
that does work but for most people with
severe depression we can find the
medicine which will help them and where
the benefits will outweigh the risks
